website_summaries.verdict: It's not the cheapest option on the market, but its dependable performance and easy installation offsets the initial cost.
pros: Satisfied customers praise its super easy setup and sleek modern anodized finish
cons: It has a lot of extras like a burglar alarm and fire detection sensor which you may not need

website_summaries.verdict: Though the lock is well made and the alarm features are functional, the technology is first-generation and lacks the advanced capabilities of other smart options.
pros: Features fire and tamper alarms with adjustable sound
Double security features work with both key card and password for added protection
cons: Some owners would prefer if the lock had a more modern, streamlined design
It's difficult to install, instructions are confusing
Not as intuitive as other models

customer_reviews.title: Don't risk it
customer_reviews.text: Works sometime but not consistently. It took a little bit to install. Not much time at all. If it worked, then great, but the touch screen is very finicky. The inside us to have an additional magnetic piece that makes it look cluncky as well. Very frustrating as I thought Samsung did good work consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Abg

customer_reviews.title: Annoying, frustrating, and terribly designed
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly bad experience. Getting the lock to turn on so you can actually enter a code involves a shocking amount of finger mashing on the outside. A fob cannot be read until you've done this, so it's not convenient like other RFID fobs. The app takes several agonizing seconds to connect. The installation was also painful as the motor kept being unable to push the bolt all the way. I'm new to installing locks so normally I'd call it my fault, but my replacement lockwas very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kaschel

customer_reviews.title: it is very good. You can easily buy compatible RFID cards or ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is very good. You can easily buy compatible RFID cards or stickers on the internet. I currently carry an RFID sticker in my wallet which takes up no space at all. I wish I could put the RFID sticker inside my iPhone case, but this won't work with iPhone with ApplyPay radio. Android phone with RFID disabled works fine. The design and build quality is goodish, not great. The opening mechanism rubbed against the door frame unless I loosen the mounting screw a bit. Installing and programming in a couple of keys took me about 2 hours. This include making some minor adjustment to my misaligned door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Fit Most Doors
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s a great lock, but if you have a door with holes already cut, expect this lock WILL NOT FIT. The cylinder is not at the bottom of the device as you would expect, it is in the middle. Also, I made the assumption it would work with my Samsung SmartThings hub, but it does not (I'll admit that was my mistake, but just a heads up).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Just want I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be able just to walk up to my door and it unlocks and this does just that with the key fobs. I didnt want the Alexa or Google anything so this was it. It was a little hard to install and you really have to read the directions. After that you are good to go. Changing pins and such is no problem. It's nice not to have a key anymore. My key chain gets lighter and lighter. It's also nice to give somebody a code to get in instead of a key and then you can wipe it if needed. Well worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Khomme

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to program
customer_reviews.text: Most of the installation instructions were fine to figure out If you don't deal with deadbolts often, then be careful to understand how the pin inside works and where you're supposed to break it. That is not clear at all. Otherwise, the instructions were fine. Now, after getting it on the door, I attempted to program it and had a horrible time. In fact, I never was able to get past the first step. Google searches and attempts by multiple people couldn't get it to work either. At least two people, including myself, deal with this type of thing all the time and have never had this much nonsense. Ended up giving up on it and taking it out.
customer_reviews.author: David Duffield

customer_reviews.title: Great for the frequent key-forgetters
customer_reviews.text: I frequently forget my keys and this is a lifesaver. I watched the recommended video and it was really easy to install. I have set up 4 different pass codes for my parents, a few friends, and a house-sitter — all very easy. I love this and I’m not going back to a keyed deadbolt!
customer_reviews.author: Susie Derkins

customer_reviews.title: The one I received DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I am an electrical engineer and fairly technical. I read all the instructions and could easily program key codes and get the device to "beep" at me telling me it was programmed correctly. However, I could not get the key pad to light up to put a code in and the key fobs (which I also programmed) did not even register. I am 99% sure I had a defective unit. I sent it back and am getting and August brand one. I have no feedback on differences at this point, but clearly the quality testing needed help or the instructions needed to be better.
customer_reviews.author: Guru1

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS DOOR LOCK
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product do not waste tour money I bought 3 for my House first one started alarming after about 2 to 3 weeks of use with no issues it would not let me in the house (still don’t know why) I removed first one to return and installed next one in its place within 2 weeks same problem there is no help number in the instructions with first one I called a general Samsung helpline and the lady not only didn’t help but was rude and tried to make me feel stupid....I am pretty mechanical and can install pretty much anything so it really through me for a loop and her attitude definitely did not help
customer_reviews.author: Connie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Nice if you want to go keyless
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good product. I like it. Pretty simple to install. If you've install door locks before, this is the same. Just a few extra steps for the electric part. The setup of the RFID chip and PIN access is straight forward in the instructions. It's has an auto lock feature, which is great. No more wondering if the door is locked. The only thing I didn't find or was able to do, is to disable the intrusion alarm. Which I can understand why. Other then that it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DjKnS

customer_reviews.title: One of the best keyless dock locks to have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since living in Korea, I have loved their technology especially their door locks!! Being back stateside, I’m shocked there aren’t more keyless doors especially in apartments. Less money to when keys are lost and having to replace locks. It’s simple to install(as long as u read the instructions ha!) it’s looks amazing. If you want something simple, sleek, guaranteed to work, get this one!!! Remember it’s not a smart keyless entry!! Got it on my front and back door apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchess Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock. Can be annoying at times
customer_reviews.text: I got this lock for my front door, I am an AirBNB host and wanted to be able to change codes between guests, and not worry about them locking themselves outside. Overall I love this lock and it works great. It was easy to install, easy to program & re-program, and the FOB features is nice to have. A couple things that annoy me is if you lock it with the button and then unlock manually (Turning knob) it has a blaring alarm that is super annoying until you enter your code. Besides that slight annoyance I would highly recommend this lock!
customer_reviews.author: Austyn Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Finnicky but good
customer_reviews.text: Finnicky, but great to not have to rely on keys. Sometimes the auto lock doesn't work too well when the door is closed too tightly and the alarm goes off when the turnkey is used and door opened too quickly, but effective door lock and easy to use. Can use lots of pin numbers too.
customer_reviews.author: ss.lee

customer_reviews.title: Keypad Unreadable in Daylight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and program (see instructions on YouTube.) But it is VERY difficult to see the keypad in the daytime. And, if the sun is shining on the face, you can't see the keypad even when crouched down to look at it directly. I should have listened to other comments about the keypad not being visible in the daytime. I like the automatic lock when the door shuts. I regret the purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Everyons Uncle Ed

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lock....for about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I checked the reviews a saw quiet a few that mentioned that it stopped working around 6 months but I figured maybe they just had bad luck. It's supposed to automatically lock when you close the door but mine has stopped doing so about 1 1/2 months ago. I either have to turn the lock manually when I come inside of the house or I have to press the screen to activate the lock as I'm leaving. I've tried to activate the warranty on the Samsung website and its not even listed so I guess I'm screwed at this point. I really wanted to give this a good review because I actually loved it until it stopped functioning properly.
customer_reviews.author: DarrylD

customer_reviews.title: Great lock very hard to hack
customer_reviews.text: This lock is amazing! Install is a little hard but not too bad took like 45 minutes. But after got installed was very easy to do code and tag set up. The best part of the lock is no key hole, no bump key or anything will break it. Seems very well built and love that is locks behind us. Friend of mine went to defcon and one of the few locks they had issues with and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kicker58

customer_reviews.title: Had no issues for 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the lock so i dont have to carry with keys on me... it work well for 8 months, now the touch screen it doesnt lit when touched and the deadbolt doesnt move at all when lock from the inside with the touch button even when the door is open... keep this in mind, THERE IS NO CUSTOMER SVC from samsung at ALL. they send you to a third party company to deal with this... had no issues with it until now. Contacting Amazon for this...
customer_reviews.author: Kasad

customer_reviews.title: Hard to program.
customer_reviews.text: Two starts for great style and key fobs. Cannot program quickly or easily, even with manuals. Might of been defective. Not sure, but was a waste of my time and money to purchase and ended up returning after no one from seller could help me program after I installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen.
customer_reviews.text: You have to literally put 4 fingers on the touch screen to wake it. I like all of the other features- auto lock (I did lock myself out of my house the first time it activated) X( I installed this in about an hour...replaced a previous electronic lock. Programmed two proximity keys and one code.
customer_reviews.author: D. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Cracks on Screen Finish
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this unit to replace the one that was on the house that we bought.(same model) The screen on the old unit was severely scratched and hard to read and we assumed it had been caused by the previous owner. Unfortunately the same issue has occurred on the new unit. The scratching is so bad to the point that the screen is almost impossible to read. See picture. This unit is less than two years old. We have been very careful not to use our finger nails to activate the screen but it hasn't helped. I would love to know why this is happening. If someone from Samgsung could offer any help that would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Reid

customer_reviews.title: This product will lock u out of your home FOREVER
customer_reviews.text: As a big Samsung fan I'm going to advise you not to buy this. I ended up buying another brand that works 100% of the time. For starters the Keypad does not light up. Second, there is no BT or SmartPhone App. Third, you've got to figure out the beeps, etc. to determine what it's doing. This product needs help -- smartphone app and BT would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keypad does not work when door is closed
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful doorlock and loved using Samsung digital locks in Korea. However, after installation the keypad does not function nor light up. Thank God I have the key version. Now I'm stuck using a manual key on a digital keyless doorlock. The instructions were followed and even watched the YouTube set up 3x. Customer service is aloof and no response either by email or phone. Website says call center is 24 hours and then the specific dept is only on certain hours. Overall, very nice looking on the outside, inside is full of trouble and unknown. Go Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We've had this lock for 6 months now. It's already broken. The batteries die after only opening the door a couple times. The seller sent us a piece of it to replace and it didn't fix it. They were supposed to send the other part but haven't. The warranty we purchased with it from Amazon won't cover a replacement because it's supposedly still under manufacturer warranty and the 3rd party seller just isn't getting back to us at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Atiba & Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: This lock has made it so easy to get in and out of our house and looks fantastic on our front door! Love how I can set individual codes for people and delete them when I no longer want them to have access. The RFID mini Keys are also super convenient when you have your hands full and don't want to juggle your groceries to type in a code to get in the house. Would Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Bosua

customer_reviews.title: Junk. Had this for barely a month. Did ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Had this for barely a month. Did not last the alarm started to go off for no reason wen opening from the inside. also the lock cant face the sun or it will get extremely hot within minutes and overheat and slow down. 180$ to the trash
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: great product, the only issue I have is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Item failed after 5 months. unit keeps beeping (security sound). It would activate even if the device has not been operated. Unit was reset and reprogram but still continues to alarm. Magnet sensor was verified and even move closer to the sensor but alarm still make non-stop alarm. I am trying to figure out how to get the warranty going for this. it is seem so hard to get the warranty submitted/ requested. Bought this item last Aug2018.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dayao

customer_reviews.title: Good lock. Simple install but make sure you have the clearance to install it!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were fairly easy to follow after reading them a few times. There is also a installation video on YouTube. I have a 2 year old so I disabled the chimes. Works really well. I installed on my mudroom door which leads to my garage. I'm pleased with this purchase. I only wish it came with RFID tags and stickers. Mine only came with 4 tags.
customer_reviews.author: MrsAjj

customer_reviews.title: Nice, handy, and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Install is straight forward, but be careful as the magnetic sensor clip is VERY weak and can break easily. Love how it works and setup is very easy. Outside touch takes a few taps before the screen becomes active. I would recommend wiping away fingerprints as they do tend to smudge a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rick I.

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years still going strong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set a few years ago and wanted to wait a bit before writing a review. I have to say I am very impressed. After 2 years and it's still going strong. I've have not had any problems with them at all. Of course, I did visit Korea a few years ago and saw these Samsung touch screen locks everywhere so I knew these would be a win. I have to say I'm so glad I made the switch to this touch screen door lock.
customer_reviews.author: XP

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. i've owned a few smart deadbolts and ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT. i've owned a few smart deadbolts and this one rolls right by the rest. I also love the fact that it isn't wifi connected and I believe this is purposeful. if anyone is on the fence on buying this product, i'd say pull the trigger. Everyone who has been to my house has raved on how good it looks, how well it works and how easy it is to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: When attempting to unlock from the inside, it malfunctions. It automatically unlocks and locks, and continues to repeat this for several cycles, making it impossible to open the door. When the lock functions as intended, it's great. However, when malfunctioning, I would not want to be trapped inside my house if there's a fire, being attacked by a bug or other creature, etc.
customer_reviews.author: 3steved

customer_reviews.title: number on the keypad are hardly visible after 18 months of usage
customer_reviews.text: ++Update number on the keypad are hardly visible after 18 months of usage ++Original review setup a slightly confusing but with youtube videos I was able to get it to work. included instructions are pretty useless. you can then use any NFC tags as keys, no need to buy expensive ones that are Samsung branded.
customer_reviews.author: morbidz28

customer_reviews.title: Works great just doesn't have the functions I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work with wifi to be accessed remotely and does not work with samsung smart things. Would have returned it but had a death in the family and I ended up outside of the return date before I was able to install it
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation great lock
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, installation is very easy and the programming of codes fast and easy. The key cards the best idea
customer_reviews.author: Marco S.

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung standard
customer_reviews.text: By far one of the best door locks you can buy. It may not be connected to WiFi but honestly, not everything needs an internet connection. Highly reccommend this. Pro tip: buy a screen protector as you would for your phone and put it on the face to prevent scratching or any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: had to return it don't buy......
customer_reviews.text: this lock sucks in all type of ways.. it worked 3days had to return it it kept opening and closing and opening and closing I was like really brawl-_- TRASHHHHHHH!!!!!!! trust me don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Diana Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. No special skills needed besides half a brain and two hands.
customer_reviews.text: Initial review.. Had the lock in for 2 days now. Works great. For someone that has never installed this type of a lock it was pretty straight forward. I strongly recommend watching the YouTube install video first. Really helps with the visual. Programming the password and the key tags was probably the easiest part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dony buy, dont waste your time like i did.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Instead lack bit was never able or strong enough to lock or unlock. Tried for 5 hours or so. Makimg adjustments and simply would not work. Terrible lock, returned and bought a Yale lock insyes. Dont waste your time, thusnis not a good lock. I love all samsung products, but this one is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Menchaca

customer_reviews.title: WATCH YouTube video BEFORE programming!
customer_reviews.text: Programming is a breeze after you watch the YouTube video. Note: You cannot register a PIN CODE and an RFID TAG to the same User Number! It's mutually exclusive and the user manual does not mention this. I wasted a few hours thinking this was the case. Dummy me! Otherwise, great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Cellophaan

customer_reviews.title: Zero regrets
customer_reviews.text: This lock is life changing. All the past reviews are true regarding the motor not being strong and it sort if being a pain in the butt to install, but once you get it right (expect to spend about 3 hours to get it perfect), then it'll be one of the best purchases youll make for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J. Mayberry

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the ass and feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: After spending 3 hours on the install, the lock only opens, and the code makes it shut. I professionally diagnose and fix aircraft systems for a living, this lock is rigged backwards if your door opens outward with right hinges. Even if I’m wrong the hassle isn’t worth it and their are cheaper locks that connect to Z wave, this has no connectivity at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lock. Lock door with one hand
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lock. The entire family is very happy with it. Makes it very nice to be able to lock the door behind you with only one hand simply by holding the handle. One thing to be aware of is the automatic lock feature will not function correctly if your door does not close correctly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It was clearly a returned product and missing parts. Fortunately, I just needed the main lock itself to replace my broken one, so it worked out OK.
customer_reviews.author: IP Litigator

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. I would like to see Wi-fi connectivity in the next model as I don't want to change my whole latch set-up for the other versions of Samsung smart locks. Definetly wishing this integrated into SmartThings.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Lock is crap!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work from the day we got it. I love Samsung, have appliances, TV's, on my fifth Samsung phone. This lock is crap!
customer_reviews.author: Randy L. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great and I really wish it worked, but I screwed around with it for 3 days trying to get it to work right. Everything was setup properly and the lock was aligned perfectly. It just didn't have enough power to open and close the lock. I was really bummed out because I love samsung products. I only gave it two stars because it looks great on the door. Maybe I got one made on a Friday evening...
customer_reviews.author: justin cole brummett

customer_reviews.title: This lock simply didn't function as advertised, and there is 0 support for this item!
customer_reviews.text: Apparently, Samsung sold this division, and there is no longer any support for this lock. Add to that that it wouldn't function as advertised, and wouldn't even reset as advertised! After purchasing two, thinking that maybe I had a lemon on the first try, I ended up returning both, and going with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron L.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy if you follow directions and it works as advertised. I am completely satisfied and would recommend to everyone who likes touch screen locks. The best feature is that you can have up to 12 digit security code. If you don't like punching numbers there are 4 fobs and are super easy to register.
customer_reviews.author: Zarko Horvat

customer_reviews.title: Great modern door lock for traditional deadbolt style
customer_reviews.text: I bought SHS-P717 for entry door lock (mortises style) and this one for garage into house door lock for its traditional deadbolt style lock. Both of them looks very clean, high tech, and minimalistic matching our modern design house perfectly. It has 70 key code memory vs 40 from larger P717. Kids love it so much and show it off to friends. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: RHuang

customer_reviews.title: Professional installation recommended
customer_reviews.text: Once the product was installed it worked as expected. We had a professional locksmith do the install after reading the docs. Glad we did. It took him several hours to get it proper aligned (he had to remove/reinstall twice to get proper alignment)
customer_reviews.author: M Hankinson

customer_reviews.title: My all day project
customer_reviews.text: Lock was for my front door,unable to function probperly unable to get it to lock an stay locked.touch screen did not function as it should have,I think the lock might have been defected to start with? I will ask for an exchanged,to try a different deadbolt.i did like the way the deadbolt looked on my door.
customer_reviews.author: Al m.

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and modern!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sleek design of this lock, and installation was quite easy. At first, however, the deadbolt would not lock/unlock when pressing the button, and it turns out that there are three long screws that cannot be over tightened. After loosening those screws, everything worked flawlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Tran

customer_reviews.title: Easy entry
customer_reviews.text: Easy entry without key. Works great but would prefer a Bluetooth compatible type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliable if installed correctly
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great piece of equipment. Works well and solid build quality. The instructions for install could use some work but are fine if you have any knowledge or experience with electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Farase

customer_reviews.title: Auto locking is a must - love this
customer_reviews.text: Got this newer model for my daughters house. I have an older model for the last 4years and love it- the auto lock function is our favorite feature.
customer_reviews.author: alisia

customer_reviews.title: Keeps morons out!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I have an NFC ring and it worked perfectly for this. My dumb roommate loves to forget to lock the door when he leaves but now... He locks himself out... Perfect gift to myself
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Samsung door lock
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Match almost all retro locks. Easy to install and setup just folowing samsung videos. Highly recpmended. Add a modern touch.
customer_reviews.author: Luis B.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking keyless lock!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed, looks very modern, easy to setup and use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celine

customer_reviews.title: Worst lock do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Lock doesn’t work even when professionally installed. Constantly locking and unlocking randomly and we cannot get inside our house.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: arrived used!
customer_reviews.text: I read about people receiving an open box and possible damage item. I can confirm, it is true. what a waste of my time calling customer's service, being on hold for an hour. They will pick this up. and I am sure they will resell it to the next sucker.
customer_reviews.author: S. Amber

customer_reviews.title: Paint comes off and lock doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this lock. It is finicky and will lock you out. Additionally, the paint on it wears off after a few months of use. Our nicely white painted door now looks as though black paint has dripped all over it. Incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Works well, hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Lock works great. Hard to install. There is an issue with the lock where an alarm goes off and I cannot find a solution in the manual. Overall, I recommend it if you don't mind paying someone to install it for you.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cabeza

customer_reviews.title: electronic devices are not the best option for your door
customer_reviews.text: this digital locks only last for two years, don't spent your money on this after a year and a half you notice the key pads stop working you can not longer enter the passcode to use the touch screen. you feel unsafe to know if the device will open the door automatically i hope if the seller reads this review, so they can sent me a replacement door lock. i tried brands and they do they same thing. electronic devices are not the best option for your door. unless maybe if they have a regular key as well but still you want the key pad to work the way they are designed to work
customer_reviews.author: Leo,Downey,CA

customer_reviews.title: Great lock don't have to worry if kids leave door ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lock don't have to worry if kids leave door unlocked anymore. Bought generic 13.56 tags and work great. I wish the confirmation beep louder outside when leave.
customer_reviews.author: Saul C.

customer_reviews.title: great addition to my home!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was painkess, just follow the installation guide and it should be a breeze! Only thing I had to do was make room for the magnet for the sensor on the interior of the door. It looks sharp, and works flawlessly! Installed on my front door.
customer_reviews.author: seng saelee

customer_reviews.title: ... sometimes gets confused and buzzes until reset which is annoying but so far hasn't locked me
customer_reviews.text: Work ok but sometimes gets confused and buzzes until reset which is annoying but so far hasn't locked me out
customer_reviews.author: Naran K. Patel

customer_reviews.title: Have to mess with it to get it to work but when it does it's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bolt is finicky. Have to mess with it to get it to work but when it does it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: dylper

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine but lacks a few features I liked from previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine but lacks a few features I liked from previous models. Physical button to activate keypad and lockout switch to prevent keypad from activating at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lin

customer_reviews.title: couldn’t get this bad boy to work
customer_reviews.text: as an incredibly tech savvy person, I say this not even wanting to — but after two electricians and myself completely rebuilding it three times, this product STILL doesn't work correctly
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Housing
customer_reviews.text: Be worn the exterior is "Plastic Housing" that looks like solid metal. Return and got a better one.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Good for new doors
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lock, but be careful not be tricked by the picture here is why: The cylinder on the photo appears to be in the bottom where the turn knob is but NO it is between the number pad and the round part in result you can't install this in doors where you already have two part lock, the bottom part of this lock needs about 2.5 inches space therefore it blocks the top part of your lower lock (handle) I hope I was able to describe well. It is of course very nice and well made and ideal and very luxury item for a new door. I returned it with regret.
customer_reviews.author: orasadil

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions, good device
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were not clear. Had to look through YouTube videos and trial and error. But now that it's set up, everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: Diem Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Great Product. If you are not sure how to install it there is a youtube video for it. UPDATE: Been using this for a year and works like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy to install once you have right tools
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to install once you have right tools. My previous bolt lock hole was smaller than this one. Had to buy additional tool to drill a bigger hole. Other than that great product. Too bad it's not wifi enabled.

customer_reviews.text: This product sent me used, in the photos you can see that the sensor cable was forced when disconnected and the connector of the sensor was broken. These are one of the most unpleasant things one can have after giving so much money for a smart lock. Compare the base connector from left and right. >:-(

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works very well most of the time. It occasionally sets off the alarm when you unlock and open the door. You do have to get really close with the fob to make it unlock.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great keyless entry system. So far works very good. Just pay attention during the installation otherwise doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Lock is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Going for a run is so much nicer when you don't have to worry about bringing a key :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bush

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of s*** !!!
customer_reviews.text: Worst piece of S*** I've ever bought. Don't even think about buying this. I love samung products but this they should scrap this. It has a mind of its own. installation wasn't hard but programming was very difficult. exterior keypad stops working for no reason at the most inopportune times . the alarm would off at the middle of the night again for no reason. I could go on and on . This thing doesn't deserve one star. AGAIN DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Bermeo

customer_reviews.title: Samsung needs better quality assurance/ the unit is good once it gets in
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and it didn't have all the parts in it ..Samsung needs better quality assurance ..obviously...***Updated************Once in the system works well .. Nice looking unit keep pad is very easy touch so you don't have to pound it to work.. th bad is the keys need to touch the unit which was a surprise I thought as long as it's close within an inch or so it would work but no...and the full on reset to factory default was difficult.. I some how did something to put in the main security code wrong and it was a pain to reset...but overall the unit works well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: NOT SUPPORTED IN THE US!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a Samsung user, I was super excited about this sleek, keyless entry option. I had the lock for less than 2 weeks when it started randomly beeping. I couldn't get it to stop unless I removed the batteries. Then I began to search for a customer service number but none existed. When I called Samsung directly they shared that these locks are not supported in the US and I would have to call Indonesia. When I sent an email to the vendor, to date I never got a response. I couldn't take it anymore so I returned the device. It's a shame because it was a beautiful piece.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Buyer

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: I got the order fast. I installed the unit according to instructions provided, but the lock wouldn't turn on. Defective unit DOA, Amazon wasted my time. I can't even use my old lock because it was a different fit. If Amazon replaces my lock, I'll update if it works.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa made me do it

customer_reviews.title: I like the this lock
customer_reviews.text: I like the this lock. So far it works. I did have a problem with installation. After the first attempt, I had to call a locksmith.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lock. If you are planning on putting this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lock. If you are planning on putting this on a door with glass around the lock, you might want to get a different lock. Someone could break the glass and open the lock, otherwise, this is an excellent lock for a solid door. Very poor programming instructions though. I had to go on youtube to learn how to program it, but after that, I really liked it. If you plan to install it in direct sunlight, you will have a problem seeing the screen when the sun is shining directly on it. Remember, solid door, out of direct sunlight, this is the lock for you.
customer_reviews.author: James Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works great. My family loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Installation took an hour. Make sure to find right setting for you (left-handed vs right-handed) in every step. Included RF tags are a bit thick so I bought sticky key tags separately. It is so convenient to unlock door using RF tag attached to phone.
customer_reviews.author: TAE IN LEE

customer_reviews.title: This lock and HD Video Depot rocks!
customer_reviews.text: First I want to say that the customer service rocks. I was one of the lucky ones who broke the magnetic sensor in the board. They fixed it for me and sent it back to me. And now It works, it's amazing. However keep in mind to follow the directions to the letter. If you don't you will have headaches, believe me. I tried to make short cuts and it only brought grief! I did have to make small adjustments to the door frame in order to accommodate the installation as well. But all around it is great! HD Video Depot were great, answered every email in a timely and friendly fashion.
customer_reviews.author: gerald knight

customer_reviews.title: This is so awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa! Everyone should convert to digital keyless entry! This is so awesome!!! I love not having to carry any keys to the house. You can set different codes for guests or dog walkers and the fob works well too. We have one on the front door and one on the back door to the garage and the fob can be set to work on one or both.
customer_reviews.author: TKEGG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. Solid metal keys never again
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Solid metal keys never again. I recommend buy the item below too and put it in the back of your cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Too weak, not functional
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Plays lots of music. Not able to lock the door, though. Just tries, fails, and unlocks again.
customer_reviews.author: too much information

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: After a little fumbling around during the install, I managed to get it working properly and it works great. Love the fact that the door automatically locks whenever the door is pulled closed. Interestingly when I was having trouble installing I called the seller and was told that this lock is not supported by Samsung in the US market.
customer_reviews.author: F. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this and installed it. The directions could be ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and installed it. The directions could be a bit more clear but wasn't too difficult. I have not figured out if you can pull a log of who is coming in and out - probably should read the manual : )
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and easy to set up with the key card.
customer_reviews.author: funcase

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap. First time I ordered, they didn't send all the parts to install it. Second time I ordered it's defective or something. Tried so many times and is not working. Instructions are hard to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

product_meta.title: Samsung SHS-3321 Digital Door Lock, Black, Keyless, Electronic, Deadbolt
product_meta.description:
Size:3321 - Keyless► Enhanced Security

Random Security Code - Before entering pin, 2 random numbers to push will appear. Throws off on-lookers and spreads your fingerprints around the keypad to prevent guessing of your passcode.
Double Authentication - Both password and RFID tag are required to unlock the door
Double Locking - Use this feature to prevent the lock from being unlocked from outside, even by a key.
Anti Theft - Secure your home when your family is away. An alarm is set off when the lock is operated from inside; a sign of a thief trying to flee.
Mischief Prevention - After 5 failed entry attempts a warning sounds and the lock stops operating for 3 minutes.
Intrusion Alarm - If the door is opened while still locked an alarm will sound making the intruder less likely to stay.
Fire Warning - If temperature reaches a certain degree the thermal sensor will activate the alarm. The lock will auto unlock helping you to escape the fire.
Emergency Power - No battery; no problem. Simply use a 9V battery to power the lock from the outside panel and enter as usual.
Auto Locking - Magnetic sensor enables door to automatically lock after 3 seconds of being closed.
Auto Polling - Skip wake up/random security code when using RFID to enter.
Low Battery Warning - When batteries are low, the lock will play Fur Elise after every unlocking of the door.

► Specifications

Max User Memory - 71 user pin/RFID
Door Thickness - From 35mm to 55mm
Lockset - Tubular,handleless,deadbolt
Lock Material - Zn, Al, Polycarbonate
Fits 161 prep door - Cylinder 2 ⅛ inch diameter
Universal Deadbolt - Fits 60mm and 70mm
Battery Life - 12 months at 10 uses per day
Battery Type - 4 AA alkaline batteries
Lock Size - Exterior 2.7 x 7.1 x 1.4, Interior 2.7 x 7.1 x 1.5 inches (WxHxD)
Operating Temp -25°C to +60°C
Water and dust resistant
feature_bullets: DETAILS » Program up to 71 user codes and RF ID tags. Fits doors 35mm to 55mm thick. Automatic locking. Compatible with certain NFC items. Battery operated with emergency power contact.
DESIGN » Samsung door locks have a sleek modern design which would complement any interior or exterior door in the residential home, apartment, or commercial business office building.
EASY TO USE » Use the digital touchscreen numeric keypad to enter a password or RFID faster than you can turn a key. Shut the door and the magnetic sensor automatically locks the door for you.

EASY INSTALL » Installs on standard 161 prep doors therefore no drilling (161 Prep is a cylindrical lock prep with a 2-1/8″ hole at 2-3/4″ backset, where the door edge prep is 1-1/8″ x 2-1/4″.), universal deadbolt to adjust between 60mm and 70mm, can be installed on the right or left hand side.

SECURITY » Rigorously tested construction, random security code feature, bump and pick proof, intrusion alarm, PSB fire tested and fire detection sensor, anti tampering lock out. The lock has your back.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars258 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
